-1.title: Best of International
-1.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: "Game Chasers" is for the diehard hunting enthusiast. Russell Thornberry, Scott Haugen and fellow professional hunters will tour the United States, Canada, Mexico, Africa and New Zealand searching for big game taken with bow, rifle and muzzleloader. Each host shares his knowledge and expertise as he takes you on his encounter for big game.
imdb.title: Game Chasers
plot: "_Game Chasers_ (qv)" is for the diehard hunting enthusiast. Russell Thornberry, Scott Haugen and fellow professional hunters will tour the United States, Canada, Mexico, Africa and New Zealand searching for big game taken with bow, rifle and muzzleloader. Each host shares his knowledge and expertise as he takes you on his encounter for big game.::The Outdoor Channel
